offer_rate.title: Job Offer Rate (%) After Graduation
offer_rate.source: National Association of Colleges and Employers (NACE), Class of 2022

salary_growth.title: Salary Trajectory Over Time
salary_growth.source: Federal Reserve Bank of New York, Labor Market Outcomes (2023)

industry_distribution.title: Internship Types by Industry (%)
industry_distribution.source: Center for Research on College-Work Transitions, University of Wisconsin (2023)

access_equity.title: Access to Paid vs Unpaid Internships by Group (%)
access_equity.source: Harvard Center for Education Policy Research (2021)

time_trend.title: Shift Toward Paid Internships Over Time (%)
time_trend.source: NACE Internship & Co-op Survey, Historical Data (2015-2025)

hours_worked.title: Weekly Hours Worked by Internship Type (%)
hours_worked.source: Economic Policy Institute, Intern Labor Report (2022)

mental_health.title: Mental Health Impact by Internship Type (%)
mental_health.source: American Psychological Association, College Student Survey (2023)
